name: Hariharan
descriptionAboutYou: Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in designing and deploying high-performance web applications, mobile applications and scalable distributed systems. Skilled in .NET core, React.js, Node.js, Java, Next.js,React Native, AWS and CRM'S such as (Salesforce , Zendesk , Freshdesk and Freshsales). Proficient in microservices architecture, API development, database design, and CI/CD automation, ensuring efficient and secure software delivery.

domains.FrontEnd Development: I have Experience in Creating Web Applications and Mobile Applications with Responsive UI using React JS , Next JS , React Native , Blazor and Razor Pages

domains.BackEnd Development: I have Experience in building robust, scalable, and secure server-side applications using .Net core , Express JS , Nest Js, GraphQl, and Java with SpringBoot.

domains.DataBase: I have Experience in working with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Firebase with experience in database design, optimization, and management for scalable applications

domains.Cloud: I have Experience in using AWS (S3, EC2, CloudFront), IIS Server deployment, GitHub Actions

domains.CRM Integrations: I have Experience in Integrating the Web Application with CRM's like Salesforce, Zendesk, Freshdesk and Freshsales using their Respective Api's.

experiences: Spearheaded complete design and development of a full-stack project independently from concept to deployment using .NET, React and MS SQL
Optimized React.js UI/UX to handle and render 1000+ records using server-side pagination, lazy loading, and CDN caching.
Reorganized data schema to ensure normalization and ACID compliance, improving scalability and data integrity.
Explored agentic development workflows using GitHub Copilot and AI-assisted tools to align with modern industry standards.
Developed an Admin Portal Application and Live Agent Toolbar Application
Designed and implemented full-stack cloud applications using React.js, Java, Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.
Adopted microservices architecture for modular scalability and easier maintenance.
Developed REST APIs integrating Salesforce, Zendesk, Freshdesk, and Freshsales CRM platforms.
